mapper.select: select * from comments order by cid desc limit #{start}, #{size}
select * from comments where cid=#{cid} order by cid desc limit #{start}, #{size}
select count(*) from comments where cid=#{cid}
mapper.insert: insert into comments (uid, mpid, mtid, comments) values(#{uid}, #{mpid}, #{mtid}, #{comments})
mapper.update: update comments set comments=#{comments} where cid=#{cid}
